criteria: Accuracy in identifying the constant of proportionality from tables
Accuracy in identifying the constant of proportionality from graphs
Accuracy in identifying the constant of proportionality from equations
Accuracy in identifying the constant of proportionality from diagrams
Accuracy in identifying the constant of proportionality from verbal descriptions
descriptions: No attempt or completely incorrect identification of the constant of proportionality.
Struggles to identify the constant of proportionality; frequent errors.
Identifies the constant of proportionality with some errors.
Mostly accurate in identifying the constant of proportionality, with occasional errors.
Accurately identifies the constant of proportionality in most instances; demonstrates a solid understanding.
Consistently and accurately identifies the constant of proportionality; demonstrates a comprehensive understanding.
